notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: AFA participated in the conception of the study and its final approval. ALCZ designed the neuropsychological assessment battery. AMCC carried out the recruitment and helped with the patient follow-up. ISNR carried out the data analysis and revised the manuscript. JGRPS participated in the conception and design of the study, TCLT applications, data collection, review of the literature, manuscript writing, and revision. MJT participated in the design of the study and revised the manuscript. RAZ designed and built the LED helmet system. WSP participated in the conception and design of the study, manuscript writing, and its final approval. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
